Description: RARE+++ 1970's Vintage Soviet Molnija/Molnia Engraved, Oversized Gents wristwatch 18 Jew. *SERVICED* No Reserved Price!!! Dear customers, we present for sale this pre-owned gorgeous mega rare vintage Soviet Molnija Oversized wristwatch. This wristwatch is in excellent working condition. Keeps correct time!!! It dates from around the early 1970's. If you have been collecting watches for a while, I think you’re going to appreciate the following sophisticated antique timepiece that is hard to find nowadays. This watch is prized for reliability, convenience in use, and meets relatively seldom. A great investment! This elegant wristwatch was converted from pocket watch!!! MOVEMENT : This beautiful mechanical wristwatch has the high grade, original pocket watch movement ''MOLNIJA'' with 18 ruby jewels. Beautifully Manual Engraved !!!!! In an excellent status which was very well saved, considering age of this watch. Smooth and strong running of the balance. Movement has been recently serviced to ensure it winds and sets smoothly while keeping great, accurate time! See the photos for more details!!! CASE : This astonishing timepiece has Engraved Oversized case! Made of chrome/nickel. Case converted from pocket watch!!! The case is in good overall cosmetic condition, with soft signs of age and regular wear. The watch supplied with a brand new genuine leather strap as a Free Gift to the buyer. The case have crown for winding and setting at 12 o'clock position. See the photos for more details!!! The large winding crown is in very good shape and operates properly! Diameter watch without the crown: 45 mm.Diameter watch with the crown: 47 mm.Thickness watch: 11 mm. These watches have originally been made in a variant of a pocket watch. And in a consequence have been altered in a variant for convenience of carrying on a hand!!! DIAL : This timepiece has Engraved white, iron dial. In good overall cosmetic condition, no signs of any serious damages. Recently Engraved! The dial have black Arabic numerals and sub dial at 6 o'clock position. Cyrillic signed that reads : '' MOLNIJA / MADE IN USSR ''. The plastic dome crystal is changed with brand new one, because old one was in very worse condition! The white spots on the glass are only reflection of the light. Not damages!!! As this is a NO RESERVE auction this item will be sold to the highest bidder!!! ANY DEFECTS NOT MENTIONED BUT VISIBLE IN THE PICTURES WILL BE CONSIDERED AS DESCRIBED! Please serious bidders only, bidders with 0 feedback please contact me before you bid. For the rest of the bidders if you need to clarify any doubts you may have, please contact me! Please see my other auctions from time to time when I list other beautiful timepieces/ items!!!
Title: 1970's Vintage Soviet Molnija Engraved Oversized Gent's wristwatch, No Reserved!
